power.title: Blades of Fiery Wrath
power.fluff: The ambient magic of your unsuccessful attack manifests as countless blades of fire that lash out at nearby enemies

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have used a swordmage attack power this turn and missed all targets with it.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you have used a swordmage Fire attack power this turn, you deal fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Blastback Swipe
power.fluff: Your weapon rings against your foe like a clap of thunder, sending your enemy careening away

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier thunder damage.

section.name: Hit (Fortitude):
section.text: You push the target 2 squares.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When charging, you can use this power in place of your melee basic attack.

section.name: Aegis of Assault:
section.text: If you charge and use this power in place of your melee basic attack, you can choose to teleport your speed instead of moving your speed.

power.title: Blazing Lunge
power.fluff: You lunge toward your enemy, your blade ablaze with arcane flame

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Reflex
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage, or 2[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage if you also hit the target's Reflex defense.

section.name: Hit (Reflex):
section.text: 1[W] fire damage if you did not hit the target's AC.

power.title: Corrosive Ruin
power.fluff: You spin your weapon in a tight circle in front of you, assailing foes with a spray of acid

section.name: Attack:
section.target: each creature in the blast or burst
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, or 2d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage against a target marked by you.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implmenet's enhancement bonus acid damage if the target is marked by you.

power.title: Dimensional Vortex
power.fluff: Lashing with your weapon, you warp space, causing your foe to appear a short distance away and unleash its attack elsewhere

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within 10 squares of you hits an ally with a melee attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Aegis of Shielding:
section.text: You gain a +4 bonus to the attack roll if the target is marked by you arcane aegis

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You teleport the target 5 squares.
The target resolves the triggering attack against a creature you choose. If no creatures are within reach, the attack is wasted.

section.name: Aegis of Ensnarement:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage to you until the start of its next turn. If the target did not hit with its attack, it grants combat advantage to all creatures instead.

power.title: Dual Lightning Strike
power.fluff: Like a forked bolt of lightning, you seem to strike two creatures at once

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Reflex
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 1[W] lightning damage, or 1[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage if you also hit the target's Reflex defense.

section.name: Hit (Reflex):
section.text: Your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus lightning damage if you did not hit the target's AC.
You mark the target until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport up to 5 squares. You must teleport at least 1 squares.

section.name: Aegis of Assault:
section.text: The maximum number of squares you can teleport equals 4 + your Strength modifier.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.target: one creature other than the primary target
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Reflex
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 1[W] lightning damage, or 1[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage if you also hit the target's Reflex defense.

section.name: Hit (Reflex):
section.text: Your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus lightning damage if you did not hit the target's AC.
You mark the target until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Incendiary Sword
power.fluff: Your weapon ignites with flames as you launch it toward your enemies and, upon striking the ground, it explodes and consumes the area in flames

section.name: Prerequisites:
section.text: You must have the Swordbond class feature.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You throw your bonded weapon to the origin square. It explodes in flames as part of the attack.
You use the weapon as the implement for this power despite not currently wielding it.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

Until the end of its next turn, the target takes fire damage each time it makes an attack that does not include you as a target. The fire damage equals your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Your weapon reforms in your hand.

power.title: Shadow Snake Lunge
power.fluff: Like the shadow snake, your strike bites with deadly venom that makes you foe suffer with each movement

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 2[W] damage, or 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage if you also hit the target's Fortitude defense.
If you hit the target's Fortitude defense, you can choose to have the damage be poison damage.

section.name: Hit (Fortitude):
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage if you did not hit the target's AC. You can choose to make this damage poison damage.
Until the end of your next turn, each time the target takes an action to move, it takes poison damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement modifier.

section.name: Crit:
section.text: The target takes damage until the end of your next turn or (save ends), whichever lasts longer.

power.title: Sloth Strike
power.fluff: As your blade sinks into the enemy, its blood turns to leaden ice, causing it to stagger heavily

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Reflex
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Hit (Fortitude):
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Aegis of Assault:
section.text: While slowed, the first time the target hits with an attack, it takes cold damage equal to 2 + your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Aegis of Ensnarement:
section.text: While slowed, the first time the target moves, it takes cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Aegis of Shielding:
section.text: While slowed, the target takes a penalty to all damage equal to 2 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Transposing Lunge
power.fluff: You thrust at your enemy, a flash engulfs it, and it suddenly appears elsewhere

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Will
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Aegis of Ensnarement:
section.text: You increase your reach for this power by 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Aegis of Shielding:
section.text: When you use your aegis of shielding class power as an immediate interrupt, you can use this power as part of that action, but the damage is reduced to 1[W] + Intelligence modifier.
You must target the triggering creature, and can do so even if it is outside of your reach.

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Hit (Will):
section.text: You teleport the target into a space adjacent to you.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can resolve the hit entries any order you prefer.

power.title: Unseen Gauntlet
power.fluff: Your words of magic create a gauntleted hand that wraps around your foe, crushing it and leaving it gasping for breath

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Aegis of Ensnarement:
section.text: The target also grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Aegis of Ensnarement:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage to the first attack against it before the end of your next turn.
